name: Nobody's Story
description:
Nobody's Story is a small 2D game in which you follow the life of a salary man who try to escape is motonone life.

_____________________________________________________

Nobody's Story is a really small game I made during a Game Jam in 2018.

The game was made in less than 48 hours and is the precursor to my current journey and a big inspiration for my current game dev.

You can find the link to the gamejam here : Nobody's Story - Game Jam

The game is really rudimentary, but I had great fun putting my coding skills to test back in the day! I didn't want the game to go to waste, so here it is as a free download to play on Windows PC!

You can follow my current project at : www.fatboyandhisblob.com
